entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 10:50 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 97.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
